t: Amazon Premium Beauty Category: What is Premium Beauty? How do I join?
s: The Premium Beauty is a gated section of the Amazon website that can only be accessed by authorized sellers. This means that third-party sellers are not able to sell products in this section. This is an "Authorized Seller Environment", which means that all products sold in this section must be brand new, authentic, and unopened. Sellers who wish ...
